body:
So I just played avicus for detressing and I put a lot of work into getting all the monuments. And then... ...
[JKawesome] Gg?
[nerfgun2002] GG
[frostbite(idkback)] We told you not to break the monument!
[nerfgun2002] you did not tell me!
[acid(or something)] Nerf you are the only one doing the right thing on your team by not kill farming.

^From this, I think that we should make kill farming a rule. Cause if this goes on the losing team will never get out of their base and end the game. Anyways My OP exams are coming up so I may not be able to play. See you around on the forums, and mods please help in this.

Thank you!
~nerfgun2002

title: Kill Farming

replies.body: That's called spawn killing if you are directly outside their spawn.

replies.body: I made a mob grinder for players once got so many kills...
replies.body_tagged: I made a mob grinder for players once got so many kills...

replies.body:
Kill farming is a legitimate tactic. It's the idea of holding a choke point so the enemy can't advance in whichever direction you choose.

The big problem is spawn killing. Spawn killing is when your inside of the enemy spawn and attacking anyone that appears. The thing people forget is the enemy team needs a clear route outside of spawn.

An extremely common map to kill farm on is Quintus. This here is a diagram showing what is okay and what isn't. 
The blue shows where it's okay to stand. You can be anywhere in the main area or on just that part of the corridor. As long as the enemy team has a chance to move out of their spawn freely, without being attacked by bow or sword, and move along the green lanes it's fine. If they're blocked from either exiting their spawn or moving to an iron area, it's considered spawn killing.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I was in that match. Sorry if we were being mean to you, but we specifically said, "nerf, please leave the last monument cuz we're killfarming"
So yes, we did tell you to leave the last monument. You could've still gotten it after we were done killfarming. If you had said, "JKawesome I'll leave it but let me break it at the end", I would've left it for you to break

replies.body:
Honestly, it is your choice whether not to break the monument, or leave it for the kill farm.

They cannot just tell you to break the monument or not, it is all in your choice. So I don't really think you should get all heated up on these things. Just ignore them.
